trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods for selecting a data connection expression that is associated with a control property at design time.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder egenskaper og metoder for å velge et uttrykk for tilkobling av data som er knyttet til en kontrollegenskapen under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], uses the ConnectionStringsExpressionEditor class to select a connection string from the `connectionStrings` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: Visuelle utformeren vert, for eksempel [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], bruker ConnectionStringsExpressionEditor klassen for å velge en tilkoblingsstreng fra den `connectionStrings` konfigurasjonsdelen.

trans-unit.source: The ConnectionStringsExpressionEditor class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor> class, and although it is public for technical reasons, there is no advantage in deriving from it.
trans-unit.target: ConnectionStringsExpressionEditor klassen hentes fra det <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor>klassen, og men det er felles for tekniske årsaker, det er noen fordel i avledes fra den.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringsExpressionEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringsExpressionEditor"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates a connection string expression and provides the design-time value for a control property.
trans-unit.target: Evaluerer strenguttrykk tilkobling og inneholder verdien for utforming for en kontrollegenskap.

trans-unit.source: The EvaluateExpression method looks up the connection name and type specified by `expression`, and then returns the connection.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EvaluateExpression slår opp tilkoblingsnavnet og typen som er angitt av `expression`, og returnerer deretter tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer uses the EvaluateExpression method to evaluate a connection string expression and provide the design-time value for an associated control property.
trans-unit.target: Den visuelle utformeren bruker EvaluateExpression-metoden til å evaluere strenguttrykk tilkoblingen, og angi verdien for utforming for en egenskap for tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer uses the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder.ParseExpression%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to parse the expression string at design time, and then calls the EvaluateExpression method with the parsed expression data.
trans-unit.target: Den visuelle utformeren bruker den <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder.ParseExpression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å analysere uttrykk-strengen ved utformingen, og kaller deretter metoden EvaluateExpression med datatypen analysere uttrykk.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder.ParseExpression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The visual designer uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den visuelle utformeren bruker resultatet evaluerte uttrykket til å tilordne kontrollen egenskapsverdiene som gjengis på utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: At run time, the page parser uses the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder.EvaluateExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder.GetCodeExpression%2A> methods of the corresponding <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder> implementation to evaluate an expression and provide the run-time value for an associated control property.
trans-unit.target: Siden parseren bruker under kjøring av <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder.EvaluateExpression%2A>og <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder.GetCodeExpression%2A>metoder for den tilsvarende <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder>implementering evaluere et uttrykk for å angi verdien kjøretid for en egenskap for tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder.GetCodeExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder.EvaluateExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: A connection string expression to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Et strengeuttrykk en tilkobling som skal evalueres.

trans-unit.source: The expression does not include the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionStrings" name="ConnectionStrings" href=""></xref> expression prefix.
trans-unit.target: Uttrykket inneholder ikke den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionStrings" name="ConnectionStrings" href=""> </xref> uttrykksprefiks.

trans-unit.source: An object containing additional parsing information for evaluating the expression.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder analyse av tilleggsinformasjon for evaluering av uttrykk.

trans-unit.source: The type of the control property.
trans-unit.target: Typen for kontrollegenskapen.

trans-unit.source: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.
trans-unit.target: En tjenesten leverandøren implementering angitt av designer verten, brukes til å hente utformingen tilleggstjenester.

trans-unit.source: The object referenced by the evaluated expression string if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet refererer til den evaluerte Uttrykksstrengen hvis uttrykket evalueringen lyktes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an expression editor sheet for a connection string expression.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et uttrykk redigeringsprogrammet ark for et strengeuttrykk for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: The GetExpressionEditorSheet method returns an editor sheet implementation for connection string expressions.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetExpressionEditorSheet returnerer et redigeringsprogram arket implementering for uttrykk for tilkoblingsstreng.

trans-unit.source: The editor sheet for connection string expressions allows users to select a connection name and type, based on the current connection strings that are defined in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) section of the Web configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Arket redigeringsprogrammet for uttrykk for tilkoblingsstreng kan brukerne velge et navn og type, basert på gjeldende tilkoblingsstrengene som er definert i den [connectionStrings elementet (ASP.NET innstillingsskjemaet)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) av Webkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: Once users have selected the connection expression properties, the editor sheet implementation combines the connection name and type into a connection string expression, which is returned to the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: Når brukere har valgt uttrykket tilkoblingsegenskapene, kombinerer redigeringsprogrammet arket implementeringen tilkoblingsnavnet og skriver inn i et strengeuttrykk for tilkoblingen, som er returnert til den visuelle utformeren.

trans-unit.source: The expression string set for a control property, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.
trans-unit.target: Uttrykk-strengen er angitt for en kontrollegenskap som brukes til å starte uttrykket redigeringsprogrammet arket.

trans-unit.source: The expression does not include the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionStrings" name="ConnectionStrings" href=""></xref> expression prefix.
trans-unit.target: Uttrykket inneholder ikke den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionStrings" name="ConnectionStrings" href=""> </xref> uttrykksprefiks.

trans-unit.source: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.
trans-unit.target: En tjenesten leverandøren implementering angitt av designer verten, brukes til å hente utformingen tilleggstjenester.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet"></xref> instance that defines the connection string expression properties.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet"> </xref> -forekomst som definerer de uttrykket egenskapene for tilkoblingsstreng.
